mapper.select: select * from order_ o join payment p ON o.odNo = p.odNo join orderproduct op on o.odNo = op.odNo left join paymentcancle pc ON o.odNO = pc.odNo left join (select mbNo, mbName, mbPhone from member) m on o.mbNo = m.mbNo left join (select nmNo, nmName, nmPhone from nonmember) n on o.nmNo = n.nmNo left join (select m2.mbName as tnName, t2.tnNo from trainerinfo t2 join member m2 on t2.mbNo = m2.mbNo) t on op.tnNo = t.tnNo where o.odNo = #{odNo}
